name: Gin Rummy Score Tracker
description:
Gin Rummy is a card game best played across many games. However, tracking scores across games can be a tedious process where losing information is easy.

Gin Rummy Scoring allows you to see details statistics over the history of your games with an opponent. Track who has the most wins, losses and cumulative points. Who gets the most gins? Who undercuts the most? Who is the best player overall?

Find out now, with Gin Rummy Scoring!
